TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BitmapMetadata extends System.Windows.Media.ImageMetadata implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public Class BitmapMetadata Inherits ImageMetadata Implements IEnumerable(Of String)
type BitmapMetadata = class inherit ImageMetadata interface IEnumerable interface seq<string>

summary.span: 提供對點陣圖影像執行中繼資料讀寫動作的支援。

span.span: Provides support for reading and writing metadata to and from a bitmap image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 與影像相關聯的中繼資料是描述映像，但不會顯示映像所需的資料。Metadata that is associated with an image is data that describes the image but is not necessary to display the image. 每個支援點陣圖影像格式處理中繼資料是以不同的方式，但用於讀取和寫入中繼資料的功能相同。Each supported bitmap image format handles metadata differently, but the facility for reading and writing metadata is the same. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 支援下列影像中繼資料結構描述： [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)]，文字 ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)]文字資料)， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)]。supports the following image metadata schemas: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)], tEXt ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] Textual Data), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)]. 如果由取得使用，它是唯讀的預設可變動的作業將會擲回例外狀況。If a is exposed by a that is obtained by using a , it is read-only by default and mutable operations will throw an exception. 如果它由包裝另一個，它是在建構可變動。If it is exposed by a that wraps another , it is mutable on construction. 和方法可以用來建構，並讀取中繼資料查詢。The and methods can be used to construct and read metadata queries. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何撰寫中繼資料，以[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]使用 IFD 的映像和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_exif](~/includes/tla2sharptla-exif-md.md)]結構描述。The following example demonstrates how to write metadata to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] image by using the IFD and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_exif](~/includes/tla2sharptla-exif-md.md)] schemas. [!code-csharp[BitmapFrameExample#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/CSharp/BitmapFrame.cs#7)] [!code-vb[BitmapFrameExample#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/VB/BitmapFrame.vb#7)]

span.span: EXIF (Exchangeable Image File Format) Specification

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結物件 (或任何物件)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽繼承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫方法並不會呼叫直接從程式碼中，除了呼叫基底實作，同時覆寫此方法時。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要建立目前物件的可修改複本，請呼叫而不是直接呼叫這個方法。To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

span.span: The metadata at the specified query location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 與影像相關聯的中繼資料是描述映像，但這不是顯示影像的所需的資料。Metadata that is associated with an image is data that describes the image but that is not necessary for display of the image. 每個支援點陣圖影像格式處理中繼資料是以不同的方式，但用於讀取和寫入中繼資料的功能相同。Each supported bitmap image format handles metadata differently, but the facility for reading and writing metadata is the same. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 支援下列影像中繼資料結構描述： [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)]，文字 ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)]文字資料)， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)]。supports the following image metadata schemas: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)], tEXt ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] Textual Data), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)]. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來寫入中繼資料，以[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]檔案。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to write metadata to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] file. [!code-cpp[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CPP/BitmapMetadata.cpp#setquery)] [!code-csharp[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CSharp/BitmapMetadata.cs#setquery)] [!code-vb[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/VB/BitmapMetadata.vb#setquery)] 此中繼資料寫入後，方法用來讀取該資料，並發出為文字字串。After the metadata is written, the method is used to read that data and emit it as a text string. [!code-cpp[bitmapmetadata#GetQuery](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CPP/BitmapMetadata.cpp#getquery)] [!code-csharp[bitmapmetadata#GetQuery](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CSharp/BitmapMetadata.cs#getquery)] [!code-vb[bitmapmetadata#GetQuery](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/VB/BitmapMetadata.vb#getquery)]
